original_text:
How could one have chased a thousand,
    and two have put ten thousand to flight,
unless their Rock had sold them,
    and the Lord had given them up?
korean_text: 그들의 반석이 그들을 팔지 아니하였고 여호와께서 그들을 내주지 아니하셨더라면 어찌 하나가 천을 쫓으며 둘이 만을 도망하게 하였으리요

sentences.original_text: How could one have chased a thousand
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 어찌 천 명을 쫓았겠으며

sentences.original_text: and two have put ten thousand to flight
unless their Rock had sold them
and the Lord had given them up?
